alert.note: Alert for Cherokee; Cobb; DeKalb; Gwinnett; North Fulton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 11:37PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Cherokee, northwestern DeKalb, northeastern Cobb, west central Gwinnett and northeastern Fulton Counties through 100 AM EDT... At 1135 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Flowery Branch to Georgia International Horse Park, and moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Isolated nuisance flooding due to runoff from heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Atlanta, Marietta, Sandy Springs, Roswell, Johns Creek, Alpharetta, Dunwoody, Milton, Duluth, Woodstock, Chamblee, Norcross, Doraville, Berkeley Lake, North Atlanta, North Druid Hills, Tucker, Mountain Park, Mount Bethel and Sandy Plains. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Cherokee; Cobb; DeKalb; Gwinnett; North Fulton
